-Video size. Example: `{"width": 1280, "height": 720}`
+Video size. Example: `{"width": 1920, "height": 1080}`
discussion_comments.comment_body: FYI if both window_size and viewport are set, then viewport should be smaller than the window size or content will be cut off, I usually take ~40px off the height and ~5px off the width to account for the window frame.

examples\models\azure_openai.py is checking AZURE_OPENAI_KEY.
LangChain AzureChaitOpenAI reads from AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY but all the existing tests read from AZURE_OPENAI_KEY so it is better to keep AZURE_OPENAI_KEY. all existing code seems to explicitly set api_key in browser-use like below.

return AzureChatOpenAI(
model='gpt-4o',
api_version='2024-10-21',
azure_endpoint=os.getenv('AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT', ''),
api_key=SecretStr(os.getenv('AZURE_OPENAI_KEY', '')),
)
